name: Savings Friend
tag_list: coupons, coupon, code, promo, promotional, savings, discount, discounts, online, shopping, internet, deals, deal
overview:
Partnered with thousands of major online retailers such as Best Buy, Overstock.com and Amazon.com to name a few, Savings Friend combines all of their coupons, deals, discounts, and promotions into a single destination. The database where all these offers are stored is updated daily, providing the end user access to the most up to date savings. What makes Savings Friend so unique is that it’s one of the very first websites to display relevant deals, coupons and price comparison results in a single search query – ensuring all angles of saving money are effectively covered for the online shopper.

The way this all works is very concise. If a user conducts a search for the term “iPhone”, the website quickly provides lists of editor-recommended websites in which iPhones and accessories can be purchased, available iPhone related coupons and deals, and finally iPhone price comparison results from PriceGrabber retailers. These results are all conveniently displayed on screen for the user to review and act upon.

No account is required to access SavingsFriend.com and the site is completely free to use. For more avid online shoppers, the option to create a free account is available, which allows users to setup daily/weekly email alerts for their favorite online stores. Users are also given the option to become socially involved with the website. Almost all deals and promotions are sharable via Facebook, Twitter and email with a simple click of the mouse. Users are able to comment on deals and coupons, and have the option of joining in on shopping discussions at Savings Friend’s online community forums.

More and more retailers are offering unique deals and discounts to promote online spending. Savings Friend helps consumers find the most convenient online deals and coupon codes, while saving them time and money.
